tv.matchstick.fling.service

Class FlingDeviceService

  • java.lang.Object
    • IntentService
      • tv.matchstick.server.fling.MediaRouteProviderSrv
        • tv.matchstick.fling.service.FlingDeviceService

  • public class FlingDeviceService
extends tv.matchstick.server.fling.MediaRouteProviderSrv
    This class is used to do several things:
    • all fling related operations: connect, start/join/stop application,send messages,etc
    • fling device scan operations: start, stop device scans
    • contained something for media route device found
